à¼¼ ã¤ â—•â—• à¼½ã¤ {{champion:22}}  take my energyà¼¼ ã¤ â—•â—• à¼½ã¤

mine*

Take mine energy

Your English is fucking shit; Go back to school kid

> [{quoted}](name=The Table,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=qvcMR9Uh,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-10-03T21:02:45.003+0000)
>
> mine*
> 
> Take mine energy
> 
> Your English is fucking shit; Go back to school kid

You're incorrect, it's "my energy", not "mine energy". Oh, and your punctuation is incorrect. "Go back to school, kid" is correct.

> [{quoted}](name=Sylian,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=qvcMR9Uh,comment-id=000b0000,timestamp=2015-10-03T21:56:47.283+0000)
>
> You're incorrect, it's "my energy", not "mine energy". Oh, and your punctuation is incorrect. "Go back to school, kid" is correct.

How is "mine energy" possibly correct? I just don't get it.

> [{quoted}](name=IS1a442cd69a169ed293a39,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=qvcMR9Uh,comment-id=000b00000000,timestamp=2015-10-03T22:03:01.733+0000)
>
> How is "mine energy" possibly correct? I just don't get it.

Perhaps energy created by mines? There's also apparently a company called "Mine Energy Solutions", although I believe The Table is most likely just mistaken.
Well, he's from EUW, so it's entirely possible English isn't his first language. He shouldn't be correcting people on their English if he's not proficient in it, though.
"Mein" is my in German and we all know German = English, so there's that.

> [{quoted}](name=IS1a442cd69a169ed293a39,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=qvcMR9Uh,comment-id=000b00000000,timestamp=2015-10-03T22:03:01.733+0000)
>
> How is "mine energy" possibly correct? I just don't get it.

It's not; however, "mine" is the anglicized version of the German word "mein," and was originally used as a possessive adjective, rather than as a possessive pronoun. I would assume that the OP is from a country that speaks a Germanic language, and that one of two things is true: either he is unfamiliar enough with English to not realize his mistake, or he is completely trolling the native English speakers in the thread by subtly claiming linguistic dominance.

If it's the first, then lol. If it's the second, I've outsmarted him by calling his troll. Either way, NA wins. <3
If C9 pulls off a win tomorrow, they are getting out of groups for sure.
6-0 c9 is ganna win worlds :P
They still have to get past EDG and SKT. That's something I would never bet money on.
i rly hope fnatic loses to C9 and get out of groups as 2nd, being 2nd means a free pass next round where being first most likely means the end of the tournament (1st has to play either SKT1 or EGD).

? not sure how 1st has to play either SKT or EDG. Isn't it random 1 seed paired vs random 2 eligible 2 seed, where a 2 seed cannot be vs the 1 seed from their group or on the same side of the bracket or the group? So if SKT is picked first and Origen takes second and is drawn against them, then 2nd from fnatic/c9 goes against winner of the clg group, while 1st from fnatic c9 gets either edg or 2nd from clg group.

I mean basically bc edg and skt are the same group 1 of them will be in each side of the bracket, so if the matching seed isn't drawn for the same side of the bracket (ie skt and winner of fnatic/c9 group both drawn for A side of bracket means EDG and loser of fnatic/c9 group both go on B side of bracket and can't play till semi's) then both 1st and 2nd from fnatic/c9 group are eligible to play edg/skt. The diff is that first place can only play the loser of clg group (fw or koo hopefully), the loser of KT group (looks like origen currently), or edg, while 2nd place gets either SKT, or what's looking like KT rolster or CLG. 1st is a much better spot to get if you want them to move forward.
nah they have a chart set up

Do you mean this one?

http://2015.na.lolesports.com/articles/everything-you-need-know-about-2015-world-championship

Bc that is the only thing I can think of that you might mean, and it clearly says example and that the actual bracket will be randomized. Did they change something in the last month?
I'm confused, wouldn't it be second place has to face them? And that a reward for winning groups is a first round buy?

> [{quoted}](name=Facy,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=qvcMR9Uh,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-10-03T18:30:09.464+0000)
>
> i rly hope fnatic loses to C9 and get out of groups as 2nd, being 2nd means a free pass next round where being first most likely means the end of the tournament (1st has to play either SKT1 or EGD).

Don't think edg is that great from the 0-2 vs skt but Skt1 is definitely the end of the road for everyone i think :(

I wondered where all the tsm fanboys went ğŸ˜Š
im a tsm fan and im right here! in worlds its not about the teams but regions imo and the west side is crushing the east

I think its gonna come down to the top lane, if Huni plays like he did last game they will probably lose. C9 has the better botlane imo and mid should be pretty even. 2 of the best mid laners at worlds right now IMO. Shocked to see Westdoor and Bjergson and Huni but no Febiven. World class mid laner, and C9s mid is turning out well as well. I think its a toss up who will win.

idk febiven seems kinda overated he just seems to play super passive and doesnt really do much he doesnt carry like most midlaners he does go even or ahead but no kills and doesnt really make flashy plays i think its mostly on huni reinover an yellow star they are the true heros of fnc rekless seems to me there for the ride lol
